text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, can you believe it's this late<n>already? We need to
start heading<n>back or we'll miss curfew.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Time to go. ♪

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Oh, y-yeah.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, look at Rob Roy. She must have<n>really tired herself out
today.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: ...Her brain's been doin' double time<n>all day, after all.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
...Well, Bourbon. What are your plans<n>for the rest of the
evening?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I will compile today's data and<n>reconfigure the party plans.
Then I will<n>complete the rest of my task list for<n>today.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...By yourself?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Yes. That's what my role entails.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Here we are. Good night, you two.

text_block_list.name: Rice & Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Good... night...

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Bourbon! G-guess what! You<n>know the decorations we
were<n>supposed to finish tomorrow? We got<n>through them
all today!

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text:
You've been working really late on<n>party stuff, right? Since
we're free<n>now, we were thinking we could help<n>with
your tasks.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No, that will not be necessary. Please<n>use the extra time in
your schedule to<n>rest. You did your tasks, and I must<n>do
mine.

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: Wait, but...

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: We know you can do everythingall alone, but you don't have to pushyourself that hard. Let's all work together to make the party a hit!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
If I may, I'd say that escaping the<n>haunted house is a
mission for all five<n>of us.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...It's my responsibility to complete<n>the specific objectives
in my task list.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
However, the overarching mission<n>"Cross-Dorm Halloween
Party" is the<n>responsibility of all participants...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Then again, I've already turned so<n>many offers down...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Rob Roy was scared she was being a<n>bother, but she still...
She was brave<n>and helped me, so...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Maybe if I "transformed" too...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sorry for barging in like this!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Rice? It's almost time for<n>lights-out! You're
supposed to be in<n>your own dorm.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I-I know, but! I, um! I... Ummm—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: P-please let me borrow my costume! I<n>need it so I can...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So I can help Bourbon...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: ...Rice.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Aaall right, I'll fend off Fuji and<n>Hishiama for ya. Gimme a
sec, and<n>then I'll go with—

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
...Er, scratch that. Ya got the guts to<n>make it this far—you'll
be fine.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Rice, I'm sure you'll make it work. I'll<n>grab the costume for
ya, so couldja<n>hold tight a minute?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Flower confirmed to be asleep. I will<n>relocate operations to
another room.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Remaining tasks: write event<n>proposal, complete today's<n>
decoration goals for anyone unable to<n>finish, cut fabric
supplies—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Welcome to my kingdom of the night!<n>I-I'm a vampire, and...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm going to... turn you into my<n>vampire friend!
